PASSWORD_EMAIL: If the email exists, a password reset link has been sent
INVALID_PASS_TOKEN: Invalid or expired password reset token
EMPTY_CART_COUPON: Your cart is empty, add something to be able to use coupons
PRODUCT_NOT_IN_CART: Product does not exist in your cart
EMPTY_CART_CHECKOUT: Nothing to checkout, cart is empty
UNAUTHORIZED_ACTION: You are not authorized to do this
SHIPPING_ADDRESS_REQUIRED: You have to provide a shipping address
NOT_CASH_ORDER: This order not paid by cash
